response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $15,000 to us. Considering its immense worth to you, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $14,000. This is a fantastic opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a significant discount. We look forward to hearing your decision soon. Thank you for considering our offer.", "product_price": 14000}
